name: cypress-javascript
description: This is sample Test Automation framework designed using Cypress and JavaScript

scripts.clean: rimraf mochawesome-report/ && rimraf test/cypress/videos/ && rimraf test/cypress/screenshots/
scripts.test:cli: npm run pretest && cypress run --headed --browser chrome --spec 'test/cypress/integration/my_info.spec.js'
scripts.create:html:report: npm run merge:reports && marge --reportDir test-report cypress-combined-report.json

author: QA Loop
